verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ndugu zangu twendeni
tukatoe sadaka, Twende kwa moyo safi-tukatoe sadaka

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: (kwani) ukimpa Mungu wako sadaka kwa moyo mnyofu (naye) naye Mungu atakuona hakika siku zote X2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Twende kwa ukarimu- tukatoe sadaka, mkate pia divai-tukatoe sadaka

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Mazao ya mashamba-tukatoe sadaka, hata na fedha zetu tukatoe sadaka

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Hata kidogo twende-tukatoe sadaka, hata na nyoyo zetu tukatoe sadaka
